alert.note: Alert for Christian; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 12:44AM EST until March 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches. Although the snow is ending, roads are still slick and hazardous in some areas. The advisory remains in effect due to the presence of poor road conditions as temperatures drop. * WHERE...This advisory is generally along and southeast of a line from Cadiz to Central City Kentucky, including Hopkinsville. * WHEN...Through 6 AM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on bridges. Allow extra time to reach your destination. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest concern is for icing of wet or slushy roads before they can dry out late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
